item.title: Resources
item.description: Resources for the book ‘Tame Your Inflammation’ Health Tracker can be found here. Please make a copy of this sheet. If you wish to download the sheet in a different format, you can do so by selecting File –> Download in the linked sheet and selecting the format of your choice.

item.title: Books
item.description: My latest book is out! You can buy them at the following places: Amazon (India, ebook) Amazon (India, paperback) Flipkart (India, paperback) NotionPress paperback Pothi paperback Amazon (US, ebook and paperback) Amazon (UK, ebook and paperback) Amazon (Germany, ebook and paperback) Amazon (Australia, ebook and paperback) Amazon (Canada, ebook and paperback) Amazon (Netherlands, ebook and paperback) Amazon (Poland, ebook and paperback) Book Resources
